## Description {#details}

Provide suitable custom traits struct for function pointers.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> pointers can&#39;t be directly given these traits as functions can&#39;t have their alignment computed with <code>alignof</code> and we need different casting.

To rely on higher alignment for a specialized use, you can provide a customized form of this template explicitly with higher alignment, and potentially use alignment attributes on functions to satisfy that.

Definition at line 125 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/pointerliketypetraits-h">PointerLikeTypeTraits.h</a>.
